'''The Wind and The Star Traveler''' (subtitle: {{Lang|mini=1|fr=''Le Vent et les Enfants des étoiles''|fr_tl=The Wind and the Children of the Stars}}) is the first original [[soundtrack]] album to be released for ''[[Genshin Impact]]''.

It features a total of 15 tracks composed by Yu-Peng Chen of [[HOYO-MiX]]. The music was performed by the {{w|London Philharmonic Orchestra}} and recorded by AIR Studios.

It was released on Spotify, Apple Music, and YouTube on June 19, 2020.<ref name="qa">Twitter: [https://twitter.com/GenshinImpact/status/1273842948329922564 OST Release Announcement]</ref> The original soundtrack CD version of the album was released on August 4, 2021, as an attachment to the CD set "[[City of Winds and Idylls (CD Set)|City of Winds and Idylls]]."
